5 GOSUB900
10 A$=INKEY$:IFA$=""THEN10
15 EXEC
20 GOTO10
900 A=36352:I=0
905 READV
910 IFV=-1THENEXECA:RETURN
915 POKEA+I,V
920 I=I+1
925 GOTO905
1000 DATA206,0,54,255,142,44,150,2
1005 DATA145,0,39,244,182,142,43,136
1010 DATA128,183,142,43,183,191,255,254
1015 DATA142,44,9,156,0,38,251,150
1020 DATA255,151,2,182,191,255,129,255
1025 DATA38,220,57,0,0,0
1030 DATA-1
